name: Tank-UP
description:
Entry for the Nokia Jam 2022

WASD  To move your tank. Press SPACE to shoot and SHIFT to fire a bomb.

Destroy enemies and take their scrap metal to upgrade your tank. Defeat the 3 bosses to win the game!

Design, coding and sprites by Emiliano Vásquez. Aditional sprites and splash Art by Bruno Vásquez.

Known Bugs: Level 1 boss is invisible during the first phase. Bombs don't carry to the next level.
